title: Ogre's Club
summaries: The Ogre's Club is a Hardmode pet-summoning item that spawns a Baby Ogre to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, the Baby Ogre will hold onto an Etherian Wyvern by its tail in order to catch up to them. The Ogre's Club has a 1/4 (25%) chance of dropping from the Ogre in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a baby ogre
'No other uses besides smashing.'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
